html:
11.17.23  9:26 pm   i may be approaching burn out on a personal project that i have worked gradually for a year now. what should be the next course of action so that i can finish this enormous project more quickly? it's been cooking for way too long, but i'm realizing not enough progress 

      well, right now you're stuck on a boat with yourself now and yourself when you started the project. i know that's not a solution, but the drama is exquisite. especially if you can get both characters to really passionately express their point of view in this

11.17.23  8:51 pm   How can I show people that they matter to me?

      if they really do, then you can just tell them. if they don't really, but you tell them anyway, they might not believe you

11.17.23  8:21 pm   there are toilets now

      ok i believe you

11.17.23  5:23 pm   why the green q?

      title stylization

11.17.23  5:00 pm   how soon is soon? 

      soon

11.17.23  4:56 pm   Do you feel sideways today?

      no

11.17.23  4:42 pm   How to get over feeling like you never fit in? Growing up I always felt like the odd one out and that stayed with me to adulthood. Thing is I realize lots of people feel that way so it's not like I couldn't fit in somewhere eventually. So why is it so hard to let go of this mentality? It's dumb because I want to be included and have friends and stuff but I never seem to allow myself to be part of the group. Like I tell myself stuff like I know they don't really want me here even though they're totally the ones who invited me! What's up with that? I'm tired of living like this. I guess what I'm really asking is how do you genuinely chill around other people and actually enjoy it?

      maybe you could all work on something together

11.17.23  4:28 pm   do you consider yourself an outsider musician

      i'm actually too inside

11.17.23  3:24 pm   what's you opinion on sanwiches?

      they usually have something to hide

11.17.23  12:14 pm   Is wfaoie a criticism of educational kids shows not teaching serious isues when talking about a place?

      no. it's an exploration/confrontation of my own desires to frolic around the map

11.17.23  11:38 am   does it bother you when people ask a question and then end it in a period instead of a question mark.

      no, but what does bother me is questions that begin with 'does it bother you'

11.17.23  11:17 am   how do you think

      you could spend a lifetime trying to explain it. actually that sounds like fun

11.17.23  10:43 am   what time is it?

      10 after half past midday

11.17.23  9:27 am   "Here Comes the Sun" strikes me as a very segmented song, with a lot of bits and pieces that feel like they were plucked from other demos.

     it wasn't

      My favorite of these is when you sing "I can't explain the way that I'm feeling." Is there a particular "segment" of the song you especially enjoy?

      the second pre-chorus (interesting day)

11.17.23  7:52 am   is today yesterday's tomorrow, or tomorrow's yesterday? or is it both? or anther thing?

      all of the above

11.17.23  7:39 am   Can you produce the sound of a clown horn with using only your voice?

      i estimate that i could. i'd have to listen to reference of the specific type of horn first

11.17.23  4:06 am   Every day I feel like I want to do everything, but instead I do nothing. It's killing me. How do I stop doing nothing? I'm crumbling under my own dead weight.

      you could start up your own TV show, in the Bob Ross format, where in each episode you do a finite group of things

11.17.23  1:32 am   tips on accelerating?

      ultimately you'll need a source of energy generation

11.17.23  12:47 am   Why do restaurants serve milkshakes with sprinkles on the side of the cup?

     i have no idea. this has never happened to me, but that doesn't mean it doesn't happen

     That just means I can't eat the sprinkles, unless I used a spoon specifically for them, but that would probably be weird!

11.17.23  12:43 am   what's one thing you know about 2023?

      it's 7x17x17

11.17.23  12:37 am   how to be likeable? i've been having problems being likeable so i came to ask you how to be likeable mr wurtz

      you could just remind people to like you, when you first meet them

11.17.23  12:28 am   what time is it

      10 before half past midday

11.16.23  9:48 pm   Absolutely love your work! When are the next pearls of songs coming out?

      i'm not sure but it will be soon

11.16.23  9:44 pm   Let's suppose you wake up to find you're in a universe with no chairs. Is your first action to invent the chair?

      that depends if they've also disappeared from my memory

11.16.23  9:37 pm   I wonder what people of the 1700's will think of our world now

      i think it would be surprising but it would still make sense

11.16.23  9:13 pm   what do you think about the number 727

      it might be prime. it's not a multiple of 3, (or 5, or 2), or 7, or 11, or 13, or 17, or 19, or 23, ..... and 29 squared is already higher than it, so i believe 727 is prime

11.16.23  8:53 pm   how do you make your videos

      i will eventually explain it

11.16.23  8:34 pm   Do you love the Industrial Revolution? I love the Industrial Revolution

      it's a good metaphor for other revolutions. and other revolutions, in turn, are a good metaphor for it

11.16.23  8:29 pm   How much luck do you think is required for success as a musician 

      none is required, but it's optional

11.16.23  8:08 pm   I've been wondering recently if you have ever answered something that wasn't a question.

      yes i have

11.16.23  7:25 pm   Is it possible for a "dream job" to ever be as great as it is in your imagination?

     at certain moments. or it may be good in ways that you hadn't even imagined. or, maybe a job that you didn't think would be your dream job actually ends up being very good

     It seems like no matter how great something sounds to work on, it'll always be at least a little worse than you thought it would be. Are our brains just bad at expecting stuff accurately?

      i'm not surprised that we can't predict the future perfectly. sometimes it's better and sometimes it's worse

11.16.23  6:58 pm   Could there be a planet that is identical to Earth somewhere in the universe?

      i don't see why not

11.16.23  5:00 pm   do you ever find a set of songs to be best listened to together in a certain order?

      not really. but if you throw some non-song material into the mix, (scenes, dialogue, things happening,) then songs can play along in sequence with that very well

11.16.23  4:53 pm   thoughts about thoughts?

      ridiculous

11.16.23  4:29 pm   how do i cat

      not even cats know that

11.16.23  2:09 pm   What do you think of noodles?

      i've never seen the end of a noodle. therefore i suspect all noodles might be the same noodle

11.16.23  1:39 pm   are you paying attention?

      to what? nevermind, yes

11.16.23  1:22 pm   If I want to go to heaven, which religion should I pick? I don't want to guess incorrectly and wind up in hell by accident. Like, what if I live my life as a devout catholic, but then I go to hell and the devil is like, "Oh sorry. Nice try, but the correct answer was Zoroastrianism. Thanks for playing."

      it's never like that. pick whichever one means the most to you

11.16.23  12:06 pm   what should i have for lunch

      that's none of my business

11.16.23  11:52 am   What should I write a story about?

      everything. i assume no one has tried that yet

11.16.23  11:47 am   your work that you share with us always leaves me feeling such a lovely way, and it makes me want to continue developing my own creative endeavors. but whenever i work on one of my projects, i end up feeling so frustrated that it's not what was in my head. do you have any way to avoid the stuck feeling and maybe a way to feel okay with a low-quality finished product?

      i'm not sure. but i think everyone deals with that

11.16.23  8:50 am   how to fail easily?

      try to spell 'buses'

11.16.23  7:40 am   Can you come up with a question for me to ask?

      no

11.16.23  3:53 am   are you creative everyday?

      yes

11.16.23  1:15 am   how do i cope with you not answering my questions?

      i'm not sure

11.16.23  12:06 am   When we discover aliens, how do you think the conversation on things like the sasquatch and loch ness monster will change?

      probably not at all

11.15.23  11:57 pm   If you could live without one emotion, what would it be?

      there's infinite emotions, so it will probably have to be more than one

11.15.23  11:54 pm   i love that you answer many of these questions so unexpectedly literally. like, "favorite sound effect?". instead of answering with a sound effect, you answer with your interpretation of the noun, "favorite sound effect". favorite ueqstions moment?

      it will be something in the future, i assume

11.15.23  11:05 pm   do you like it when people ask you overly meta or self-referential questions?

      i assume you are refering to the 'normal' and 'standard' questions. anyway, i like most questions. i also like not liking questions, so that really broadens the palette quite a bit

11.15.23  8:48 pm   Why do I have to analyze literature for school? I don't want to think deeply, I want to read.  

     ironically it's probably during the actualy reading that you'd probably be thinking more deeply, as well as feeling. that doesn't change your complaint, but i'm guessing you're actually being forced to think shallowly, which of course is uncomfortable

     I'm tired of having to find symbolism and stuff.

     i think what's actually happening is you'd rather EXPERIENCE the symbolism, rather than butcher it up in some corny ritual
